description: This file defines the main route component for a simple notes application built with Qwik. It manages fetching, displaying, creating, editing, and deleting notes, integrating various sub-components like Sidebar, Header, NotesList, NotesEditor, and interacts with an API module for CRUD operations.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main functional component for the route, handling state and user interactions.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Sets up a reactive task to fetch notes whenever the search text changes.

methods.name: handleSelectNote
methods.description: Handles selecting a note for viewing/editing, fetching note details.

methods.name: handleCreateNote
methods.description: Prepares UI for creating a new note.

methods.name: handleSaveNote
methods.description: Saves a note, either creating or updating via API.

methods.name: handleDeleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a specified note after user confirmation.

methods.name: onSearchInput
methods.description: Updates search text based on user input.

methods.name: onCancelEdit
methods.description: Cancels editing mode, clearing the editingNote state.
